<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spot Translate](/Feats.aspx?ID=1996) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 178 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Linguist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=64)

**Prerequisites**
[Linguist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1993)

**Trigger**
Another creature within 60 feet uses a [linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101) effect in a language you understand.

</column>

---

You interpret a creature's words, repeating their message in a different language that you know. If the triggering effect's targets speak either the original language or the one you translated into, they are affected.
name: Spot Translate
